short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the live price of Bitcoin, Litecoin, and Ethereum

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome Bitcoin, Litecoin, and Ethereum Price Ticker Extension. Adding this chrome extension gives you a quick and easy way to check the price of BTC,LTC, and ETH from within your browser.
